translation.zh: 我跟我叔叔闹翻了 因为他抢我的客户

translation.en: and I beat the fuck out of him, okay?
translation.zh: 我还把他毒打了一顿 好吗？

translation.en: I beat the living shit out of him.
translation.zh: 我把他打得大便失禁

translation.en: It was a really scary moment,
translation.zh: 那一刻很吓人

translation.en: and I had a crack, and I feel awful about it and I'm...
translation.zh: 我试过了 我感觉很愧疚 我…

translation.en: I'm sorry, I didn't-- I... [sighs]
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 我不是有意…

translation.en: So I'm living in Tucson and I don't want to stay there anymore,
translation.zh: 我现在住在图森 但我不想继续生活在那里了

translation.en: but I don't really know where else to go. [sighs]
translation.zh: 但我也不清楚还能去哪里

translation.en: And it's...
translation.zh: 并且…

translation.en: I'm having a...
translation.zh: 我现在…

translation.en: [softly] I'm just having a hard time, so...
translation.zh: 我现在正经历艰难期 所以…

translation.en: -I'm sorry. Yeah. -[raspberries] I'm not...
translation.zh: -我很抱歉 真的 -我不…

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm gonna start crying again.
translation.zh: -我很抱歉 真的 -我不… -我不会又哭出来的 -好吧

translation.en: -Yeah. -This is the thing with me, all right?
translation.zh: 我这人老是这样 你懂的吧？

translation.en: -I really think it's your fault, honestly. -Why is it my fault?
translation.zh: 说真的 我觉得这是你的错 为什么是我的错？

translation.en: You used to give me the best head rubs.
translation.zh: 你以前帮我按摩头部真的很爽

translation.en: And they used to really take the edge off.
translation.zh: 可以让我的焦虑完全消失

translation.en: Quit hogging the jellybeans. Give them up.
translation.zh: 别一个人霸占着软心糖了 贡献出来吧

translation.en: -Come on. -Give me some jellybeans. Okay?
translation.zh: -拜托 -给我些软心糖 好吗？

translation.en: That's why I'm so sad. -'Cause you won't give me any jellybeans. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 那就是我如此伤心的原因 因为你不肯给我软心糖

translation.en: It's also a little hard 'cause you're really impressive.
translation.zh: 同样令我不好受的是 你现在太出色了

translation.en: Your life is really impressive.
translation.zh: 你的生活堪称完美

translation.en: -And so, there's a part of me that's... -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好吧 -所以我内心深处有点…

translation.en: Just saying.
translation.zh: 就那么说说

translation.en: I don't know. On the way here, I was getting on the plane,
translation.zh: 我也不知道 在回来的时候 我当时正要登机

translation.en: and there was this family.
translation.zh: 有一家人

translation.en: And this little boy, [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那个小男孩 他当时好生气

translation.en: he was so mad and just... just irate.
translation.zh: 那个小男孩 他当时好生气 简直是暴怒

translation.en: And, of course, he has no way of expressing any of that,
translation.zh: 当然了 他没有办法表达那种愤怒

translation.en: except to sort of just like scream and stomp his feet and...
translation.zh: 只能尖叫 跺脚

translation.en: He was screaming so loud, his tongue was curling to the back of his mouth,
translation.zh: 他叫得很大声 整个舌头都好像卷到嘴巴里面去了

translation.en: and tears were just, like, you know, springing out of his face.
translation.zh: 泪水不断涌出 挂满他的脸

translation.en: -He was leaking, you know. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 他就像是在漏水一样

translation.en: And I remember looking at him and being very jealous.
translation.zh: 我记得我当时看着他 甚至有点嫉妒

translation.en: -Yeah. That's my soulmate. -[chuckles] Me and that four-year-old.
translation.zh: 是啊 那是我的灵魂伴侣 我和那个四岁小孩

translation.en: -That's my soulmate. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -那是我的灵魂伴侣 -好吧

translation.en: I don't know. At some point, we just learn it's better not to do that and...
translation.zh: 我也不知道 人到了某个时候 就会学会最好别那样

translation.en: I don't know at what point.
translation.zh: 我也不知道具体是何时

translation.en: [Jim] Here.
translation.zh: 给

translation.en: -You ate a lot of them. -I did eat a lot.
translation.zh: -你吃了很多啊 -我的确吃了很多

translation.en: You left me all the pink and purple ones.
translation.zh: 你把粉色和紫色的都留给我了

translation.en: [Jim] Yeah. They're your favorites.
translation.zh: 是啊 那是你的最爱

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Lisa-Lisa wants to know where her ice cream is at.
translation.zh: 丽莎丽莎想知道她的冰激凌的下落

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Of course.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: -Oh, God. -Does she like ice cream soup?
translation.zh: -天啊 -她喜欢冰激凌汤吗？

translation.en: I'm just telling her I ran into someone.
translation.zh: 我就告诉她我遇到了一个熟人

translation.en: -Oh... "Someone. Someone." -Don't take it per--
translation.zh: 其他人 -别放在… -熟人啊…

translation.en: Sorry, yes. Fine, I'll tell her it's you. -Just-- -Mm-mm.
translation.zh: 抱歉 好吧 我直接说是你吧

translation.en: -No, she asked me who. It's Jim. -She's gonna ask-- There it is.
translation.zh: -不 她问我是谁 我就说是吉姆 -她会问…看吧

translation.en: Lisa-Lisa, the interrogator. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 丽莎丽莎 审讯大师

translation.en: "Holy fuckity-fuck, Jim-Jim?"
translation.zh: “我的天啊 是那个吉姆吉姆吗？”

translation.en: -She's Lisa-Lisa'ing you, man. -Yes, Jim-Jim.
translation.zh: -她把你的名字变得和她的一样 -是啊 正是那个吉姆吉姆

translation.en: [Amanda] Oh. Yes.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: She wants to know how you look.
translation.zh: 她想知道你现在长成什么样了

translation.en: She wants to know when I'm coming back.
translation.zh: 她想知道我什么时候回去

translation.en: I kinda want to see your house.
translation.zh: 我有点想看看你的房子

translation.en: You want to see the house?
translation.zh: 你想去看我的房子？

translation.en: It's been really great catching up with you.
translation.zh: 跟你叙旧 感觉真的很好

translation.en: But if the reason you're spending time with me is because
translation.zh: 但如果你肯花时间陪陪我的原因是…

translation.en: you feel sorry for me...
translation.zh: 你可怜我…

translation.en: You don't have to do it. It's okay. Okay?
translation.zh: 你大可不必如此 没事的 好吗？

translation.en: Sorry. There's boxes.
translation.zh: 抱歉 这些盒子碍事

translation.en: -Sorry. -It's okay.
translation.zh: -不好意思 -没事

translation.en: There we go.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Yeah, I've still got a lot of stuff to pack up.
translation.zh: 是啊 我还有很多东西要打包整理

translation.en: -That's a good one in particular. Yeah. -Yeah, I'll say.
translation.zh: -尤其是那个 -是啊 我觉得也是

translation.en: -Yeah, pretty much how she left it, so... -Mm.
translation.zh: 家里几乎跟她在时一个样 所以…

translation.en: I've been thinking about drywalling where the paneling is.
translation.zh: 我打算把镶板处换成石膏墙

translation.en: Maybe taking out that wall, -so it opens into the kitchen. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 或许可以把那面墙拆掉 那样跟厨房就是开放式相连的

translation.en: I don't know, there's also something kind of... cozy about it the way it is.
translation.zh: 我也说不清 就目前这个样子 其实也让人感觉挺舒适的

translation.en: Thinking about it.
translation.zh: 我还在考虑

translation.en: Uh, anyway, make yourself at home. I'm gonna go to the bathroom.
translation.zh: 总之 你随意 我去一下洗手间

translation.en: I'll see you in a sec.
translation.zh: 待会儿见

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: This is a very serious collection -of romance novels. [chuckles] -Yeah.
translation.zh: -爱情小说收藏得很全啊 -是啊

translation.en: This could not have been here...
translation.zh: 我们当年在一起时 这些小说不可能就放在这里吧

translation.en: -when we were spending time... -There were some...
translation.zh: 我们当年在一起时 这些小说不可能就放在这里吧 我觉得有些…

translation.en: I think she really started collecting when I left...
translation.zh: 我觉得她是在我离开后才开始收藏的

translation.en: -Yes. -...and I wasn't here to...
translation.zh: -是啊 -我并不在这里…

translation.en: We would have had a field day with this.
translation.zh: -否则我们一定会看得超开心的 -是啊

translation.en: -Yeah. Well... -[chuckles] I mean, let's face it. In your heyday, you were pretty...
translation.zh: 说老实话吧 你当年风华正茂的时候 其实相当…

translation.en: -In my heyday? -You were pretty romantic.
translation.zh: -我风华正茂的时候？ -你当时也是相当浪漫的

translation.en: I'm remembering when you read Wuthering Heights and made me read it.
translation.zh: 我还记得你当时在看《呼啸山庄》 你还强迫我看 然后你给我寄来了…

translation.en: -And you sent me that... -[Amanda sighs]
translation.zh: 你还强迫我看 然后你给我寄来了…

translation.en: I think it was four legal page letters that...
translation.zh: 好像是整整四页的信…

translation.en: Jim, that's extreme. It wasn't...
translation.zh: -吉姆 那很极端 并非… -你还称我为希斯克里夫

translation.en: You called me Heathcliff. You called yourself Catherine.
translation.zh: -吉姆 那很极端 并非… -你还称我为希斯克里夫 你还自称凯瑟琳

translation.en: -"I am you, and you are me." -[shushes] Will you stop it?
translation.zh: -“我就是你 你就是我” -快别说了

translation.en: -Yes, so... -That's completely humiliating.
translation.zh: -好吧 那个… -真是太丢人了

translation.en: By the way, don't pretend like you're all above this.
translation.zh: 顺便说下 别假装你已经完全脱离这种趣味

translation.en: There is a very big difference,
translation.zh: 我想指出一下

translation.en: I would just like to point out, between this lovely array of books
translation.zh: 在这一列书和《呼啸山庄》 这样的伟大的文学艺术作品间

translation.en: and the great work of art and literature that is Wuthering Heights.
translation.zh: 在这一列书和《呼啸山庄》 这样的伟大的文学艺术作品间 是存在巨大差异的

translation.en: I mean, they cannot be compared.
translation.zh: 根本无法相提并论

translation.en: Oh, here's something for you. Right away.
translation.zh: 这段话挺适合念给你听 “她立刻就知道 她的心和灵魂属于贾斯汀”

translation.en: "She knew that her heart and soul belonged to Justin."
translation.zh: “她立刻就知道 她的心和灵魂属于贾斯汀”

translation.en: -[both laugh] -What? What? Justin?
translation.zh: 什么？贾斯汀？

translation.en: It's, like... [chuckles]
translation.zh: 简直就…

translation.en: -There's no sexier name than Justin. -What? Justin.
translation.zh: -没有比贾斯汀更性感的名字了 -什么？贾斯汀

translation.en: "Oh, Justin. Do it to me, Justin."
translation.zh: “贾斯汀 快来蹂躏我吧 贾斯汀”

translation.en: -[Jim] Oh, come on. -Sorry.
translation.zh: -拜托 -抱歉

translation.en: No, there's more.
translation.zh: 不 后面还有呢

translation.en: "But it wasn't until tonight that she realized
translation.zh: “但是直到今晚她才意识到

translation.en: Justin also owned her body."
translation.zh: 贾斯汀还掌控着她的身体”

translation.en: I'm sorry. There is no comparison between this and Wuthering Heights.
translation.zh: 不好意思 这本书和《呼啸山庄》间 根本没有任何可比性

translation.en: [Jim] First of all...
translation.zh: 首先…

translation.en: [Amanda] It's sacrilegious to compare...
translation.zh: 拿这书和那书相比简直是种亵渎

translation.en: [Jim] I don't want to think about my mother reading these.
translation.zh: 我可不希望想象我妈看这些书的画面

translation.en: [Amanda] Neither do I, I have to say.
translation.zh: 我必须说 我也不想

translation.en: I've been staring at these, figuring out how to get rid of them.
translation.zh: 看着这些书 我在想着 要如何处理掉它们

translation.en: -Why? You just... -Well, I don't know.
translation.zh: -为什么？你就… -我也不知道

translation.en: It's weird, like, I had this weird...
translation.zh: 那很古怪 我有一种古怪的…

translation.en: I had a strange mortality moment where I looked at them,
translation.zh: 我看着它们 突然对死亡有了一种感触

translation.en: and I was like there's... 800 books here,
translation.zh: 我就觉得 眼前有800本书

translation.en: and even if I, for some reason, wanted to read all of these books,
translation.zh: 就算因为某种原因 我想把这些书都看完

translation.en: I wouldn't be able to finish all these books before I died.
translation.zh: 在我死前也无法把它们都看完

translation.en: That's a weird... thing. You know, like the math of that.
translation.zh: 其中的计算让人有种非常古怪的感觉

translation.en: -It's a pretty morbid thought. -I mean, just a...
translation.zh: -那真是种相当病态的想法 -我是说 就是…

translation.en: Not to be morbid, but it's just a thing. You know?
translation.zh: 不是病态 但就是有这种感觉 你明白吗？

translation.en: I don't know, it's all relative, I think.
translation.zh: 我也不知道 我觉得一切都是相关的吧

translation.en: I mean, my husband, you know...
translation.zh: 比如我丈夫…

translation.en: Maybe he would make it through this section,
translation.zh: 他或许可以看完这一层的书

translation.en: if he were lucky.
translation.zh: 前提是他幸运的话

translation.en: -[Amanda] I don't know. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我也不知道 -好吧

translation.en: Can I, um... Do you mind if I go outside? I have to make a phone call.
translation.zh: 你介意我出去下吗？ 我得打个电话

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, of course. Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的 当然可以

translation.en: -Thank you. -You know the way.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -你知道怎么出去的

translation.en: Yes, I do.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道

translation.en: [Amanda] I know, I'm sorry, I meant to call you. Yeah.
translation.zh: 我知道 对不起 我一直想打给你的 是啊

translation.en: The minute I got there,
translation.zh: 我刚来 她就把我打发出去

translation.en: she sent me right out to get some food for her.
translation.zh: 我刚来 她就把我打发出去 买东西给她吃

translation.en: Yeah, no, she seems really... She seems really good.
translation.zh: 不 她的情况似乎 很好

translation.en: You know, she's just hungry. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 她就是很饿

translation.en: Uh, I think we're just gonna stay in.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们会待在家里

translation.en: Just, you know, watch a movie or, you know, and eat. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 看部电影什么的 吃点东西

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Will you-- Can you just say that again? I didn't hear you.
translation.zh: 你能再说一遍吗？我刚没听到

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: This is amazing. This is amazing. It's like a time capsule.
translation.zh: 这太棒了 真的 简直就像时间囊一样

translation.en: -[laughs] -Yeah. It's all here.
translation.zh: 都在这里了

translation.en: -You need the black light. -A black light.
translation.zh: -你当时需要黑光 -黑光灯泡

translation.en: It was 1993. You needed a black light.
translation.zh: 那是1993年的事了 你当时需要黑光

translation.en: -Yeah, you had to have a black light. -You want to watch some, uh, Friends?
translation.zh: -是啊 得有黑光才行 -你想看《老友记》吗？

translation.en: -Seinfeld? -Seinfeld?
translation.zh: 《宋飞传》吗？

translation.en: The other option is I could do a little, uh... Gin Blossoms.
translation.zh: 另外一个选择就是 播放“野姜花乐队”的歌

translation.en: -Yes. Would you? -Or... Maybe Toad the Wet Sprocket?
translation.zh: -好啊 你愿意吗？ -或者放“蟾蜍与链轮乐队”的？

translation.en: -I hate the sound of Toad the Wet-- -Fine. Blues Traveler.
translation.zh: -我讨厌蟾蜍与… -好吧 那就放布鲁斯旅行者的

translation.en: I like Blues Traveler.
translation.zh: 我喜欢布鲁斯旅行者乐队

translation.en: You literally have every shirt you wore in high school still.
translation.zh: 你现在还保留着你上高中时 穿过的每一件上衣呢

translation.en: My mom kept stuff. That's just...
translation.zh: 我妈妈喜欢保留东西 总之…

translation.en: [Amanda sighs] God. Yeah. I remember wearing this one.
translation.zh: 很好 我还记得我穿过这件呢

translation.en: This one.
translation.zh: 这件也穿过

translation.en: -I think this one is mine. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 我觉得这件就是我的

translation.en: -I always hated this one. -I looked good in that.
translation.zh: -我当年一直都很讨厌这件 -我穿那件很帅啊

translation.en: You did not look good in it. You looked like a weird lumberjack.
translation.zh: 你穿着可一点都不帅 反而像是个古怪的伐木工

translation.en: -You say that like it's a bad thing? -It is a very bad thing.
translation.zh: -你说得好像那是件糟糕的事？ -的确很糟糕

translation.en: -Well, you know, I'm sorry. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 好吧 抱歉

translation.en: -That's private property. -Oh, really?
translation.zh: -那是私人财产 -是吗？

translation.en: -Have some respect, okay? -For what?
translation.zh: -放尊重一点 好吗？ -为什么？

translation.en: -For your privacy? -Yes. Exactly.
translation.zh: -为了你的隐私吗？ -没错 对极了

translation.en: -You probably read these to me out loud. -It's called privacy.
translation.zh: -你可能曾大声对我读过这些呢 -那叫隐私

translation.en: -No, no, that's private. -[chuckles] Oh, my--
translation.zh: -不 不行 那是隐私 -天啊

translation.en: "The winds of change are fucking blowing tonight."
translation.zh: “变革之风今晚吹得正猛”

translation.en: -[Jim] No, no, no! You don't need... -No, no, no! No. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -不 不行 你不必… -不 不要…

translation.en: -No, thank you. Nope. Nope. -"Amanda, Amanda!
translation.zh: -免了 谢谢 不要读出来 -“阿曼达…

translation.en: Who knew her name was going to be Amanda.
translation.zh: 她早知道她的名字会是阿曼达

translation.en: -What a face! -Hey!
translation.zh: -多美的一张脸啊” -别念了

translation.en: -What a spirit! -Enough!
translation.zh: -“真是有魅力的人” -够了

translation.en: My lips said, 'Hello, my friend,' but my heart said, 'Hello, my future.'
translation.zh: “我嘴上说：‘你好 我的朋友’ 但心里却说：‘你好 我的未来’

translation.en: I don't even know myself anymore.
translation.zh: 我都已经不再了解自己了

translation.en: -Jim has been ripped in half. -Burn it!
translation.zh: -吉姆已经被撕成两半了” -快烧了

translation.en: I'm so happy to bleed, for there is Amanda."
translation.zh: “我很高兴流血 因为有阿曼达”

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -[Jim] You want Japan or New York? -New York.
translation.zh: -你想喝日本还是纽约？ -纽约

translation.en: Oh, my God. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: I found a picture of you that is outrageous.
translation.zh: 我找到一张你不同寻常的照片

translation.en: You don't deserve this, by the way. Digging through my stuff.
translation.zh: 顺便说下 你没权利翻我的东西

translation.en: Listen, man, you don't have a lock on your shit.
translation.zh: 听着 老兄 你的东西又没上锁

translation.en: -[chuckles] -It's bound to get broken into.
translation.zh: 注定是要被乱翻的

translation.en: Man, I can't believe you still have all this stuff.
translation.zh: 天 我真不敢相信 你还保存着这些东西

translation.en: -[Jim] Yup. -Crazy.
translation.zh: -没错 -太疯狂了

translation.en: -[Jim] Mom was a bit of a hoarder. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我妈就喜欢囤积东西 -是啊

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Do you dare? Are you brave enough?
translation.zh: 你敢吗？你足够勇敢吗？

translation.en: The winds of fucking change are blowing tonight, man.
translation.zh: 变革之风今晚吹得正猛啊 老兄 去死吧你…

translation.en: -[Jim] Fuck you. Fuck you. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 去死吧你…

translation.en: This first classic performance is entitled, "Hanging Out," made in 1994.
translation.zh: 第一首经典歌曲叫做《闲玩》 制作于1994年

translation.zh: 我想对你说声谢谢

translation.en: Why do you--? What for?
translation.zh: 为什么…谢我什么？

translation.en: For tonight.
translation.zh: 谢谢今晚的一切

translation.en: For remembering my pink and purple jellybeans.
translation.zh: 谢谢你还记得我的粉色和紫色软心糖

translation.en: You know.
translation.zh: 你知道的

translation.en: For never making me feel wrong about who I am.
translation.zh: 谢谢你从来没让我 对真实的自我感到可耻

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: -I just... -You're embarrassed on my behalf?
translation.zh: -我只是… -替我感到尴尬吗？

translation.en: -[laughs] -No, no, I just had a thought and it's...
translation.zh: 不 我刚刚有个想法

translation.en: -What? You have to tell me. -Nothing. No, it was...
translation.zh: -是什么？你必须告诉我 -没什么 就是…

translation.en: I just told you something that I've never told anyone,
translation.zh: 我刚刚告诉你一个 我从未对任何人说过的秘密

translation.en: -and I think that you should just... -[sighs] I was thinking about...
translation.zh: -我觉得你也应该… -我刚刚想到的是…

translation.en: our first time... in the back of this truck at the lake.
translation.zh: 我们的第一次 就在这辆货车的后面 在湖边

translation.en: -All 38 seconds of it? [laughs] -Oh, shut up.
translation.zh: -想那38秒吗？ -闭嘴吧

translation.en: I was excited. I was 16, okay?
translation.zh: 我当时太激动了 而且才16岁 好吗？

translation.en: I've developed some serious skills since then.
translation.zh: 我自那之后已经学习了 很多超棒的床上技术

translation.en: -I'll have you know. -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -我就这么跟你说吧 -好的

translation.en: In fact, I've been servicing the entire Tucson, Arizona area with...
translation.zh: 实际上 我为整个亚利桑那州 图森市的人提供过“服务”…

translation.en: -What are you, a plumber? -[laughs]
translation.zh: 你是个水管工吗？

translation.en: It's funny though, 'cause...
translation.zh: 说起来很搞笑 因为…

translation.en: It's never really been like it was with us, for me.
translation.zh: 对我而言 再也找不到 当初我们上床时的那种感觉

translation.en: I mean, you know, that's a nostalgia thing.
translation.zh: 那种事总是让人很怀旧

translation.en: -You know, that's how it's... Yeah. -Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: -就是这么… -是啊…

translation.en: It's the same for me.
translation.zh: 对我而言也是如此

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -是啊

translation.en: -There's something about those dumb kids. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 当年的傻孩子很会玩

translation.en: -Yeah. -They knew something.
translation.zh: -是啊 -他们掌握了秘密武器

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -Magic. -Magic, that's right.
translation.zh: -是魔法 -魔法 没错

translation.en: -Jim? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -吉姆？ -在

translation.en: Will you kiss me?
translation.zh: 你能吻我吗？

translation.en: I know what I'm asking.
translation.zh: 我知道我在请求什么

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: I have to go, Jim.
translation.zh: 我得走了 吉姆

translation.en: -Jim, please. -Amanda...
translation.zh: -吉姆 拜托 -阿曼达

translation.en: -Hey, listen. I don't want you to go! -Please, please!
translation.zh: -听我说 我不想让你走 -求你了 别这样 拜托

translation.en: -Will you just please give me a minute. -Okay, okay, okay. Listen.
translation.zh: -你能让我稍微静一下吗？ -好的 听我说

translation.en: It's confusing, I get it. Okay? I just want... We can talk about it.
translation.zh: 我懂的 这让人很混乱 我只是想…我们能谈谈这事

translation.en: I don't want to talk about it! I don't want to talk about it.
translation.zh: 我不想谈这事…

translation.en: I shouldn't have let this game go on for so long.
translation.zh: 我不该让这游戏持续这么久的

translation.en: -This is not a game to me, though. -Do you understand that I am married?
translation.zh: -但这对我而言不是个游戏 -你知道我已经结婚了吗？

translation.en: -I understand. -You know what that means?
translation.zh: -我知道 -你知道那意味着什么吗？

translation.en: -I belong to someone else! -I understand. I'm just trying--
translation.zh: -我现在属于别人了 -我知道 我只是想…

translation.en: Will you please just give me a little bit of room.
translation.zh: 你能给我一点空间吗？

translation.en: [Amanda] Where the fuck is my coat?
translation.zh: 我的大衣放哪儿了？

translation.en: Where did you get this?
translation.zh: 你从哪里找到的？

translation.en: It was in your closet.
translation.zh: 之前放在你的柜子里

translation.en: And you just took it?
translation.zh: 你就这么拿走了吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -Why? -It's addressed to me, first of all.
translation.zh: -为什么？ -第一 上面写着收件人是我

translation.en: And second of all, I wanted to read it.
translation.zh: 第二 我想看看这封信

translation.en: Well, if this is just a game to you, Amanda,
translation.zh: 阿曼达 如果这对你而言只是个游戏

translation.en: then why do you need to read a letter that I wrote to you 22 years ago?
translation.zh: 那你为什么要看我22年前 给你写的一封信？

translation.en: What is this--? What could this possibly mean to you?
translation.zh: 这封信对你能有什么意义呢？

translation.en: You know, I don't know. I just wanted to read it.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我就是想看

translation.en: Well, this is my letter.
translation.zh: 这是我的信

translation.en: -I know that and I'm sorry. -No! I don't think you understand that.
translation.zh: -我知道 对不起 -不 我觉得你没搞明白这点

translation.en: I think you need to understand something, that this is my letter.
translation.zh: 我觉得你需要明白一些事 这是我的信

translation.en: Okay? This belongs to me.
translation.zh: 好吗？这是属于我的东西

translation.en: And you can't come into my house, and just take this,
translation.zh: 你不能就这么跑进我家 拿走这封信

translation.en: and do whatever you want with it without asking me, because it's mine too.
translation.zh: 对它为所欲为 连问都不问我一声 因为这也是我的东西

translation.en: You understand me?
translation.zh: 你明白吗？

translation.en: -What is this--? -That was my baby, too. Okay?
translation.zh: -这是怎么… -那也是我的孩子 好吗？

translation.en: It was ours!
translation.zh: 那是我们两个的

translation.en: -What--? -It was ours.
translation.zh: 是我们两个的啊

translation.en: You just fucking...
translation.zh: 你就是个…

translation.en: Why did you...?
translation.zh: 你为什么…

translation.en: Fucking...
translation.zh: 该死的…

translation.en: -Why did you do that? -Jim.
translation.zh: -你当年为什么要那么做？ -吉姆

translation.en: Why did you do that?
translation.zh: 你当年为什么那么做？

translation.en: -[stammers] You... -I was a scared kid!
translation.zh: -你… -我当时只是个吓坏了的小孩

translation.en: I didn't know how to handle it!
translation.zh: 我不知道该如何处理那种事

translation.en: You had to give me a minute! You fucking went away and you...
translation.zh: 你必须给我一点时间 你却就那么走了 你…

translation.en: You were the one who told me that we were too young--
translation.zh: 是你告诉我 我们都太年轻了

translation.en: I was scared! Why'd you fucking do it?
translation.zh: 我当时吓坏了 你为什么要那么做？

translation.en: -Oh God... -It was our life!
translation.zh: -对不起 -那是条生命啊

translation.en: [Jim breathing heavily] Fuck!
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: [sobs] We were gonna be so happy.
translation.zh: 否则我们会一直很幸福的

translation.en: We lost it. We lost everything.
translation.zh: 我们失去了它 失去了一切

translation.en: Jim.
translation.zh: 吉姆

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: -[Amanda] Breathe. Breathe. -[exhales]
translation.zh: 深呼吸…

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 好的…

translation.en: Take a deep breath, please.
translation.zh: 深呼吸吧

translation.en: -[Jim, softly] I'm sorry. -I'm sorry too.
translation.zh: -我很抱歉 -我也很抱歉

translation.en: -I'm really sorry. -I'm really sorry, too.
translation.zh: -我真的很抱歉 -我也真的很抱歉

translation.en: [Amanda] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I need you to understand something.
translation.zh: 我需要你明白一些事情

translation.en: I didn't just irrationally make the decision to do what I did.
translation.zh: 我当时做的那些事 并非是不理智地做出的决定

translation.en: And I know, I see now that it was incredibly hard on you.
translation.zh: 我知道 我现在明白了 那让你非常难受

translation.en: But I was the one who had to go in there and actually do it.
translation.zh: 但我才是那个走进去 打掉孩子的人

translation.en: Actually go through with it, you know?
translation.zh: 真正去承受那一切 你明白吗？

translation.en: [stammers] And I do get that I didn't handle it well. I didn't...
translation.zh: 我知道我当时处理得不好 我没有…

translation.en: I just... I tortured myself
translation.zh: 我折磨着自己

translation.en: going over the options alone, in my bedroom.
translation.zh: 在我的卧室里 独自思考着所有的选择

translation.en: Going over and over what I should do.
translation.zh: 一遍一遍地想 我应该怎么做

translation.en: And then you sent me that stupid note.
translation.zh: 然后你给我了那张该死的纸条

translation.en: Making all those... those weird, sarcastic jokes and...
translation.zh: 开着尴尬的 讽刺的玩笑

translation.en: And then you sent me that stupid "Get Well Soon" balloon.
translation.zh: 然后你还送了我傻兮兮的 “早日康复”气球

translation.en: A balloon, Jim.
translation.zh: 一个气球啊 吉姆

translation.en: I don't know, there was just something about it
translation.zh: 我也不知道 当时某些事

translation.en: where it became so clear to me that, that you were too young to handle it.
translation.zh: 让我清楚地明白 你太年轻了 没办法处理好

translation.en: We were too young to handle it.
translation.zh: 我们都太年轻了 没办法处理好

translation.en: And I knew that I was gonna have to go through it alone
translation.zh: 我明白我必须一个人去经历那些

translation.en: and I knew I couldn't... do it alone.
translation.zh: 我也知道我一个人做不到

translation.en: And, you know...
translation.zh: 你知道…

translation.en: Do I have regrets? Yes. Yes.
translation.zh: 我有遗憾吗？当然了…

translation.en: But, I...
translation.zh: 但是我…

translation.en: What can we do?
translation.zh: 我们能怎么做呢？

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 给

translation.en: [Jim] Please.
translation.zh: 求你了

translation.en: Will you just read it?
translation.zh: 你能看看吗？

translation.en: "Amanda,
translation.zh: “阿曼达

translation.en: I know we can get through this together.
translation.zh: 我知道我们可以一起渡过这难关的

translation.en: You are my world.
translation.zh: 你就是我的全世界

translation.en: I will never stop loving you."
translation.zh: 我永远不会停止爱你”

translation.en: [sobs] It was the first version that I wrote to you.
translation.zh: 那是我写给你的第一个版本

translation.en: [sobs] Why didn't you send this to me?
translation.zh: 你为什么没把这封信寄给我呢？

translation.en: I was scared. I didn't...
translation.zh: 我当时吓坏了 我没…

translation.en: I was just stupid. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 那时我太蠢了 对不起

translation.en: -I'm contagious. -Apparently.
translation.zh: -我爱哭的毛病是会传染的 -显然是这样

translation.en: -[Jim] It's okay. It's okay. -Now it's just never going to stop.
translation.zh: -好吧 没事的 -现在我哭得止不住了
